description:
It was discovered that Tar for Node.js did not properly sanitize path inputs.
An attacker could possibly use this issue to read arbitrary files, resulting
in a directory traversal attack.

node-tar.description: read and write portable tar archives module for Node.js

title: Tar for Node.js vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
Tar for Node.js would allow unintended access to files if it received specially
crafted input.
